meanings.sent1: The trueborn princess had a kind heart.
meanings.sent2: The trueborn heir inherited the throne.
meanings.sent3: The trueborn puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her trueborn talent shone brightly on stage.
meanings.sent5: The trueborn flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.

meanings.definition: Having a right by birth or descent.
meanings.sent1: The trueborn citizen cherished their heritage.
meanings.sent2: The trueborn noble held power in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The trueborn cat claimed the best spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His trueborn leadership guided the team to success.
meanings.sent5: The trueborn star illuminated the night sky with its brilliance.
